com.li.xiaomi.xiaomilibrary.base

类 BaseActivity<V,P extends BasePresenter<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.li.xiaomi.xiaomilibrary.base.BaseActivity<V,P>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PermissionChecker
    直接已知子类:
    BaseBottomActivity

    public abstract class BaseActivity<V,P extends BasePresenter<V>>
extends AppCompatActivity
implements PermissionChecker
